mapper.select: SELECT g.seq, g.name, g.biz_no AS bizNo, g.biz_type AS bizType, g.biz_kind AS bizKind, g.ceo_name AS ceoName, g.jachigu_code AS jachiguCode, g.invest_flag AS investFlag, g.fax AS fax, g.tax_name AS taxName, g.tax_email AS taxEmail, g.tax_tel AS taxTel, c1.name AS jachiguName, g.invest_flag AS investFlag FROM sm_member_group g LEFT OUTER JOIN sm_common c1 ON (c1.group_code=29 AND c1.value=g.jachigu_code) WHERE g.seq=#{seq}
SELECT COUNT(*) cnt FROM sm_member_group WHERE biz_no=#{bizNo}
